verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. I will lift up<WH5375> mine eyes<WH5869> unto the mountains<WH2022>: From whence<WH370> shall my help<WH5828> come<WH935>?
My help<WH5828> cometh from Jehovah<WH3068>, Who made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>.
He will not suffer<WH5414> thy foot<WH7272> to be moved<WH4132>: He that keepeth<WH8104> thee will not slumber<WH5123>.
Behold <WH8104>, he that keepeth Israel<WH3478> Will neither slumber<WH5123> nor sleep<WH3462>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is thy keeper<WH8104>: Jehovah<WH3068> is thy shade<WH6738> upon thy right<WH3225> hand<WH3027>.
The sun<WH8121> shall not smite<WH5221> thee by day<WH3119>, Nor the moon<WH3394> by night<WH3915>.
Jehovah <WH3068> will keep<WH8104> thee from all evil<WH7451>; He will keep<WH8104> thy soul<WH5315>.
Jehovah <WH3068> will keep<WH8104> thy going out<WH3318> and thy coming in<WH935> From this time forth and for<WH5704> evermore<WH5769>.
